news_header: Homeowners in Bellway properties face issues with damp, leaks, and poor construction, leading to disputes over warranties and repairs.
news_text: Dean Carpenter and other homeowners in Bellway estates are experiencing significant issues with their new homes, including dampness, leaks, and mold. Despite complaints, Bellway and the NHBC have rejected claims, stating that the properties meet building regulations. Homeowners are frustrated with the lack of resolution and are considering legal action. Bellway has acknowledged some faults in their roofs but claims to be working on solutions. The situation highlights concerns about the structural warranties and the responsibilities of builders in ensuring quality construction.
